query:
SELECT p.name, SUM(c.quantity) as total 
FROM consumption c 
JOIN products p ON c.productId = p.id 
WHERE c.userId = 1 
GROUP BY p.name 
ORDER BY p.name;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4FysZ9MrVV6QjYg.root --database EyQJop6MbQkDXkB9byGYLR --execute SELECT p.name, SUM(c.quantity) as total 
FROM consumption c 
JOIN products p ON c.productId = p.id 
WHERE c.userId = 1 
GROUP BY p.name 
ORDER BY p.name;
